title: Review Submitted
description: Fires when a user submits a review.

reviewId.description: The unique identifier of the review.

targetId.description: The unique identifier of the item being reviewed.

targetType.description: The type of item being reviewed.

rating.description: The rating given in the review.

hasText.description: Whether the review includes text content.

hasMedia.description: Whether the review includes media attachments.

isVerifiedPurchase.description: Whether the reviewer has a verified purchase of the item.
